title: Empathy Wad, Michael Bay Back 5.21.20
itunes:title: Empathy Wad, Michael Bay Back 5.21.20
description:
In episode 635, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by War On Women singer and the author of Making Spaces Safer Shawna Potter to discuss the Trump administration trying to shut down covid-aid, GOP seeking doctors to support their re-opening claims, some covid-19 conspiracy theories, Trump threatening to withhold federal funding for states considering vote-by-mail, Michael Bay planning on filming a pandemic-themed thriller, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trumpworld Wants to Pump the Brakes on COVID Aid, Figures It Can Spend Closer to the Election
  2. GOP seeking doctors to back reopening strategy: report
  3. Trump Fans Gobble Up His Favorite, Unproven COVID Drug—Some Are Even Trying To Cook It Themselves
  4. Trump threatens to withhold federal funding for these states considering vote-by-mail
  5. "Anti-Coronavirus" movie filmed in Arizona in 7 days
  6. A Coronavirus Thriller Was Finished Just Before the Shutdown
  7. Adam Goodman & Michael Bay Team On Pandemic-Themed Thriller ‘Songbird;’ Production Starts In Five Weeks
  8. The Biggest Conservative Dog Whistles in Michael Bay’s Benghazi Movie 13 Hours
  9. WATCH: War On Women - Pleasure & The Beast

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
